column4: If I boot to a live cd and chroot to the / of the dying drive, can I run a mysqldump?
but if its dying idk how well it will work

I can actually boot, but there's an issue (the drive is dying) but it mounts readonly.  I tried earlier writing out the dumps to a thumb drive (mounted in /mnt) but that too was read only.  Now that I'm at home (no customers busting in) I can probably dork with it enough to get it to write out
